artist: Designer: Christian Berger; Manufacturer: John Hugo Manufacturing Co.
description: iron housing of building with tin walls (red brick on 2 sides; doors and windows on front); wood on PR side; battery-operated mechanism
inscription:
Inscriptions and Sticker

on front, in gold: [WIRELESS BANK.]; on bottom of frame, incised: [PAT. MAR. 11, 1913 - NOV. 10, 1914 - DEC. 19, 1916 - SEPT. 24 / 1918]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [#293-16 / \"Wireless Bank\" / (Tin, Wood, Iron) / 71100 / #270M / 150 / 4210]
title: "Wireless Bank" mechanical bank
